TeamMembers.BCDCMotivation: We are passionate about creating eco-friendly mobility solutions for a greener future.
Our goal is to contribute to reducing carbon emissions through cutting-edge bicycle design.

ProjectWorkStages.StageNotes: During this stage, our team brainstormed and conceptualized various design ideas for the innovative bicycle.
In this stage, we started building the initial prototypes based on our conceptual designs.
We conducted rigorous testing and made iterative improvements to the prototypes to enhance performance and reliability.
During the final stage, we worked on refining the prototypes and preparing them for production.

Solutions: Implemented regenerative braking to recharge the battery during braking.
Utilized energy-efficient components to reduce power consumption.
Developed a custom power management system to extend battery life.
Incorporated solar panels for supplementary charging.
Conducted extensive wind tunnel testing to refine the bicycle's design.
Utilized computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations to identify areas of improvement.
Incorporated aerodynamic fairings and streamlined components.
Collaborated with aerodynamics experts for design optimization.
